battlecode.common
Class GameConstants

java.lang.Object
  battlecode.common.GameConstants

public final class GameConstants
extends java.lang.Object

Defines game constants used throughout the packages. This class is meant to be used in other classes with an import static battlecode.common.GameConstants.*;.

Field Summary
static double ARCHON_PRODUCTION
          The amount of energon per round an archon produces
static double ATTACK_BONUS_RATE
          The fractional attack bonus per unit height difference
static int BASE_FLUX_PER_ROUND
          The base amount of flux drawn from each deposit each round
static double BROADCAST_COST_PER_BYTE
          Additional cost per byte of message size
static double BROADCAST_FIXED_COST
          Fixed cost to send a message
static int BYTECODES_PER_ROUND
          The number of bytecodes a robot can execute each round
static double CHANNELER_DRAIN_FRACTION
          The fraction of energon received after draining
static double CHANNELER_DRAIN_PENALTY
          The amount of damage incurred by a channeler when draining
static int CLIMBING_PENALTY_RATE
          The movement penalty rate for climbing up terrain
static double ENERGON_RESERVE_SIZE
          The amount of energon a robot can hold in reserve
static double ENERGON_TRANSFER_RATE
          The amount of energon a robot can receive per round from transfers
static int EXCEPTION_BYTECODE_PENALTY
          The bytecode penalty that is imposed each time an exception is thrown
static int FALLING_PENALTY_RATE
          The movement penalty rate for falling down terrain
static int FLUX_BURN_COST
          The cost of using the Archon's flux burn ability
static int FLUX_BURN_DURATION
          The duration of the Archon's flux burn ability
static double FLUX_BURN_PRODUCTION_INCREASE
          The increase in production an archon receives from the flux burn ability
static int LOADING_PENALTY_RATE
          The loading penalty rate for loading from different height terrain
static int MAP_MAX_HEIGHT
          The maximum possible map height.
static int MAP_MAX_WIDTH
          The maxiumum possible map width.
static int MAP_MIN_HEIGHT
          The minimum possible map height.
static int MAP_MIN_WIDTH
          The minumum possible map width.
static int MINING_ROUNDS_PER_HEIGHT
          The number of rounds you can mine a flux deposit at a given height before you must build upwards
static int NUMBER_OF_INDICATOR_STRINGS
          The number of indicator strings that a player can associate with a robot
static int ROUNDS_TO_CAPTURE
          The number of rounds it takes to capture a flux deposit
static int STACK_SIZE_LIMIT
          The maximum stack size a robot can use without incurring penalties
static int WORKER_MAX_BLOCKS
          The maximum number of blocks that can be carried by a worker
static int WORKER_MAX_HEIGHT_DELTA
          The maximum height delta a worker may move upwards while carrying a block.
static double YIELD_BONUS
          Percent of upkeep returned per unused bytecode for ending the round early

WORKER_MAX_HEIGHT_DELTA

public static final int WORKER_MAX_HEIGHT_DELTA
The maximum height delta a worker may move upwards while carrying a block. Also the maximum negative height delta a worker may load a block from.
